snippet: Le’Bryan Nash scored 19 points and had 6 rebounds and 5 assists as the No. 24 Oklahoma State men overcame an 11-point deficit at home to beat Central Arkansas, 91-63.
abstract: Oklahoma State defeats Central Arkansas, 91-63, in men's college basketball; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Le’Bryan Nash scored 19 points and had 6 rebounds and 5 assists as the No. 24 Oklahoma State men overcame an 11-point deficit at home to beat Central Arkansas, 91-63.

headline.main: Oklahoma State Romps Past Central Arkansas
